page.title: 10HEALTH 2
page.content: { St Joseph's } St Joseph's is a hospital that caters for severely handicapped patients (known as residents). Originally it was a mansion belonging to Mr George Ramsay,up until the second world war.It was then used to house U.S. soldiers, and later was bought by 3 nuns. It cost them {ten {thousand}pounds. The money was raised through charity. The surrounding ground covers 20 acres of land. It also has facilities like a swimming pool, chapel and a school which is situated in the grounds of the estate. The 180 residents were overwhelmed when the Pope John Paul II paid them a visit in 1982.The employers at St Joseph's consist of trained nurses,nuns and others e.g. estate workers;orderlies.
